strings: <voice_0x01000F53><se_low>King Clavius: I saw my son take an Argon heart from one of the merchants. Did you even take him to the royal hunting ground?

<voice_0x01000F54><se_low>King Clavius: I saw everything from up here.
You must tell me the truth.
Out with it!
<voice_0x01000F55><se_low>King Clavius: ...I see. So this is the Argon heart he obtained with your help.

<voice_0x01000F56><se_low>King Clavius: Why didn't he simply show it to me?
I would not have cared about the size.
<voice_0x01000F57><se_low>King Clavius: I fear this means Charmles is far too immature to take the throne... Or a wife.
<voice_0x01000F58><se_low>King Clavius: However, that is a matter between Charmles and myself. You did a fine job in taking him to the royal hunting ground.
<voice_0x01000F59><se_low>King Clavius: The magic mirror is in the royal vault on the fourth floor. You are free to take it whenever you wish. I have already instructed the guards to admit you.
<voice_0x01000F5A><se_low>King Clavius: And I will take this Argon heart.
<voice_0x01000F5B><se_low>King Clavius: It might prove useful when I need to remind Charmles of his foolhardiness.
